title: Self-Supervised Temporal Graph learning with Temporal and Structural Intensity Alignment. (arXiv:2302.07491v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Temporal graph learning aims to generate high-quality representations for graph-based tasks along with dynamic information, which has recently drawn increasing attention. Unlike the static graph, a temporal graph is usually organized in the form of node interaction sequences over continuous time instead of an adjacency matrix. Most temporal graph learning methods model current interactions by combining historical information over time. However, such methods merely consider the first-order temporal information while ignoring the important high-order structural information, leading to sub-optimal performance. To solve this issue, by extracting both temporal and structural information to learn more informative node representations, we propose a self-supervised method termed S2T for temporal graph learning. Note that the first-order temporal information and the high-order structural information are combined in different ways by the initial node representations to calculate two conditional

Title: Self-Supervised Temporal Graph learning with Temporal and Structural Intensity Alignment. (arXiv:2302.07491v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
Abstract: Temporal graph learning aims to generate high-quality representations for graph-based tasks along with dynamic information, which has recently drawn increasing attention. Unlike the static graph, a temporal graph is usually organized in the form of node interaction sequences over continuous time instead of an adjacency matrix. Most temporal graph learning methods model current interactions by combining historical information over time. However, such methods merely consider the first-order temporal information while ignoring the important high-order structural information, leading to sub-optimal performance. To solve this issue, by extracting both temporal and structural information to learn more informative node representations, we propose a self-supervised method termed S2T for temporal graph learning. Note that the first-order temporal information and the high-order structural information are combined in different ways by the initial node representations to calculate two conditional
translated_title: 自监督的时间图学习与时间和结构强度对齐
translated_abstract: 时间图学习旨在生成用于基于图的任务的高质量表示，同时包含动态信息，最近引起了越来越多的关注。与静态图不同，时间图通常以连续时间上的节点交互序列的形式组织，而不是邻接矩阵。大多数时间图学习方法通过在时间上组合历史信息来建模当前的交互。然而，这些方法仅考虑了一阶时间信息，而忽视了重要的高阶结构信息，导致性能不佳。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种自监督方法，名为S2T，通过提取时间和结构信息来学习更具信息量的节点表示。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种自监督的时间图学习方法，通过提取时间和结构信息来学习更具信息量的节点表示。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a self-supervised method for temporal graph learning, which learns more informative node representations by extracting both temporal and structural information.
